snippet.title: Kerbal Space Program - Enhanced Edition for Xbox Series X|S and PlayStation 5
snippet.description:
Kerbal Space Program Enhanced Edition is out now on Xbox Series X|S and PS5!

This is a free upgrade for all current owners of KSP Enhanced Edition on Xbox One and PS4 consoles. The new generation console version comes with a ton of performance improvements around framerate, resolution, shaders, and more. These improvements not only benefit the moment to moment gameplay experience, but also allow for more complex vessels to be designed and more intricate missions to be orchestrated. Also… now with full mouse and keyboard support!

Don't miss another Kerbal Space Program launch!
Web: https://www.kerbalspaceprogram.com/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/KerbalSpaceP
Facebook: http://facebook.com/KerbalSpaceProgram 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/kerbalspacep

Check out more from Private Division by following our social below:
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/PrivateDivision
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/PrivateDivision
Twitter: https://twitter.com/PrivateDivision
